product.title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

Little did Walt Disney know that when he took the classic Brothers Grimm fairy tale and made it into a movie in 1937 that he would be creating his own classic story of good and evil. Disney's Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs was the world's first animated feature film—a story that has delighted generations of children. Your children will love reading Snow White, and so will you . . . again!

Tie-in Activity: Snow White has a number of animal friends who help her whenever they can. Go through the book with your child and count the number of different animal friends that appear with Snow White. It might also be fun for an older child to create a sculpture of her favorite dwarf using modeling clay.
